book.synopsis: Out to Eat - London 2002 dishes up over 380 individually recommended restaurants, cafes and pubs. Whether you crave haute cuisine in Soho or a hotpot in the suburbs, Out to Eat will steer you to London

s best to dine alfresco, close that business deal or entertain the kids
*arrive on time - easy-to-use maps show all locations and nearest transport options
*be inspired - lively features reveal unusual eateries and the latest trends
